title: Spectre Staff
summaries: The Spectre Staff is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that fires a fast-moving white "Lost Soul" projectile which homes in on the nearest enemy. The projectile looks similar to the one fired by the Ragged Caster, but cannot travel through blocks. It has a 5*1/20 (5%) / 9.75*39/400 (9.75%) chance to drop from Ragged Casters found in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, the Lost Soul projectiles can deal damage three times before disappearing.

statistics.Damage: 65 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 68 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Mana: 15 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 11 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
